problem.display_name: Text Input with Hints and Feedback

stringresponse.p: You can use this template as a guide to the simple editor markdown and OLX markup to use for text input with hints and feedback problems. Edit this component to replace this template with your own assessment.
stringresponse.label: Add the question text, or prompt, here. This text is required.
stringresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.
stringresponse.correcthint: You can specify optional feedback like this, which appears after this answer is submitted.

stringequalhint.answer: optional incorrect answer such as a frequent misconception

stringresponse.stringequalhint: You can specify optional feedback for none, a subset, or all of the answers.

demandhint.hint: The W3C You can add an optional hint like this. Problems that have a hint include a hint button, and this text appears the first time learners select the button.
If you add more than one hint, a different hint appears each time learners select the hint button.
